divs: sighting detailswas watching shooting stars when my boys called my attention to the "foo". it was a goldish pulsating sphere that went over abingdon,va at 12:01 am aug 3, 2010. although the boys have seen one before here farther off after the major siting here 6\23\ 2010, they had never seen one this close. it scared the younger for a bit as he believed me, but had never been able to dicern for himself that it wasnt from here.it again traveled in the rough same vector crossing over i-81 to roughly traverse and follow maine street in abingdon, va. this is the fourth seen at close range of this specific type, 3 gold and one red in the three years i have been here. i am an ex army recon and vehicle identity specialist................it's not ours (meaning human).
Summary: Watching shooting stars with my boys. Goldish pulsing sphere as in the June 23, 2008, following same basic track as "Foo Fighter" then. Although they had seen one and I posted pic on the webboard before, this was as close as the initial on 6/23/08.
